name: Gutenberg Blocks by WordPress Download Manager
author: WordPress Download Manager

sections.description:
Gutenberg Blocks by WordPress Download Manager is the collection of beautiful ready-to-use custom blocks for the new Gutenberg block editor. Primarily, this plugin covers various download manager features like embedding package or category within a page/post. Additionally, it includes lots of generic UI blocks to give you more customizability option with your page design.

WPDM Blocks

  • Package – a block to show a download/file/package
  • Packages – query download managers items using various filters, like WP_Query for download manager items
  • Category – a block to list downloads from the selected category/categories
  • Category Blocks – shows selected download manager categories in UI blocks with different styles
  • Signup Form – add sign up form with custom signup role selection option
  • Login Form – add login up form
  • Dashboard – Add user dashboard
  • Search Results – Add search option on a pge
  • Table Builder – Builder all downloads table visually ( Available with WPDM Pro Only )

UI Blocks

Please install Attire Blocks for many free UI block and ready to use layouts
sections.installation:
1. Upload wpdm-gutenberg-blocks to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
